title: 2/bd, $1500 OFF SELECTR UNITS !!Mountain views, Situated in Henderson!
posting_body: ['Seize your chance to make these peaceful, pet-friendly apartments set in the heart of Henderson, NV your home.', 'Conveniently located near the Cadence neighborhood with amazing city views of Las Vegas, make our community your new place to truly live!', '-Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements', '-Separate dining area', '-Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', '-Oversized closets', '-Energy efficient appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher', '-Resident social lounge with shuffleboard table and foosball', '-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity', '-State-of-the-art fitness center                                                                                         Featured amenity', '-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)', '-Barbecue pavilion and picnic area', '-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:', 'Only a small one-time payment', '-Onsite playground', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
